alert.note: Alert for Kimble; Mason (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 05 at 3:19AM CDT until October 05 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Kimble County in west central Texas... Southern Mason County in west central Texas... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 318 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near I-10 Near The Kimble-Kerr County Line, or 10 miles east of Segovia, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hilda around 350 AM CDT. Loyal Valley around 400 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Us- 87 Near The Mason-Gillespie County Line, The Intersection Of I- 10 And Us 290, and I-10 Near The Kimble-Kerr County Line. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 476 and 477. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
